member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Passwords.IPasswordStrengthEstimationService
member.summary: Defines the interface of the password strength estimation service. This service allows estimating the strength of a password.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Passwords.IPasswordStrengthEstimationService.Score(System.String)
member.summary: Estimates the strength score of the specified password.
member.param: The password whose strength score should be estimated.
member.returns: The strength score of the specified password. The score is a value between 0 (low) and 4 (high). The higher the score, the stronger the password.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Passwords.IPasswordStrengthEstimationService.Entropy(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the entropy of the specified password.
member.param: The password whose entropy should be returned.
member.returns: The entropy of the specified password.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Passwords.IPasswordStrengthEstimationService.CrackTime(System.String)
member.summary: Estimates the time required to crack the specified password.
member.param: The password whose crack time should be estimated.
member.returns: The time required to crack the specified password, in seconds.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Passwords.IPasswordStrengthEstimationService.CalculationTime(System.String)
member.summary: Estimates the time required to calculate an answer for the specified password.
member.param: The password whose calculation time should be estimated.
member.returns: The time required to calculate an answer for the specified password, in milliseconds.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Secrets.Attributes
member.summary: Describes the attributes on an item stored in the secrets storage.

member.summary: Gets or sets the moment when the item was created.

member.summary: Gets or sets the moment when the item was last updated.

member.summary: Gets or sets the moment from when the item becomes active.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Secrets.Attributes.Expires
member.summary: Gets or sets the moment from when the item becomes inactive.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Secrets.ISecretsStorageService
member.summary: Defines the interface of the secrets storage service. The secrets storage service allows retrieving and writing secrets stored in a secure storage.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Secrets.ISecretsStorageService.GetSecretAsync(System.Uri,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the latest version of a secret from the storage.
member.param: The base URL for the concrete secrets storage.
The secret name.
The cancellation token.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The specified secret.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Secrets.ISecretsStorageService.GetSecretAsync(System.Uri,System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the specified version of a secret from the storage.
member.param: The base URL for the concrete secrets storage.
The secret name.
The secret version. If the specified value is null or empty then the latest version will be returned.
The cancellation token.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The specified secret.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Secrets.ISecretsStorageService.SetSecretAsync(System.Uri,System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sets the specified secret to the storage.
member.param: The storage base URL.
The secret name.
The secret value.
The cancellation token.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The secret.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Secrets.ISecretsStorageService.DeleteSecretAsync(System.Uri,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Deletes the specified secret from the storage.
member.param: The storage base URL.
The secret name.
The cancellation token.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The secret.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Secrets.ISecretsStorageService.GetSecretsAsync(System.Uri,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets a set of secrets.
member.param: The base URL for the concrete secrets storage.
The number of results that should be retrieved per page. If null a default page size will be used.
The maximum number of results that should be returned. If null all secrets will be returned.
The cancellation token.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The secrets.
member.remarks: This operation may take some time as multiple requests will be performed to the server, if necessary, to retrieve the pages.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Security.Secrets.ISecretsStorageService.GetKeyAsync(System.Uri,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the latest version of a key from the storage.
member.param: The base URL for the concrete secrets storage.
The key name.
The cancellation token.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The specified key.

member.summary: Gets the specified version of a key from the storage.
member.param: The base URL for the concrete secrets storage.
The key name.
The key version. If the specified value is null or empty then the latest version will be returned.
The cancellation token.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The specified key.

The maximum number of results that should be returned. If null all keys will be returned.
The cancellation token.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The keys.
member.remarks: This operation may take some time as multiple requests will be performed to the server, if necessary, to retrieve the pages.
